name: bj-vtoclf
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w1), w0)
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wex(s0, wi(w1, w0))

|- wex(s0, wi(w1, w0))
-| wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wi(w1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- w0
-| w1
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wi(w1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
-| wcel(c0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- w0
-| w1
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wi(w1, w0))
-| wcel(c0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wi(w1, w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- w0
-| w1
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wcel(c0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))

comment: Remove dependency on ~ ax-ext , ~ df-clab and ~ df-cleq (and ~ df-sb and ~ df-v ) from ~ vtoclf . (Contributed by BJ, 6-Oct-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
